name: Pug Adventure
description:
Pug Adventure is a short 2D platformer made with Unity. It is a project made in a week by me, a computer science student. I have made the music, sprites and code. The sound effects are from FreeSound.org. 

All the game assets can be found for free on the following GitHub repo: 

https://github.com/hxrvas/PugAdventure .
